short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get your daily tabs up and running with one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get your daily used tabs up and running with one click and forget about open tabs. 

1. Add your daily sites to the list, just once.
2. Setup your sites with one click.
3. Close all other open tabs (optional).

Stop worrying about leaving the tabs with the sites you visit everyday open, and being careful for not closing them when you mess your browser window with too many new tabs open at the same time. 

Save time everyday getting your daily tabs ready to go with one click.
